# Request for Proposal for Absence Management Services Program
=============================================

## Call for Bid Details
------------------------

### Title
**English (en)**: Request for Proposal for Absence Management Services Program
**French (fr)**: DEMANDE DE PROPOSITIONS VISANT UN PROGRAMME DE SERVICES DE GESTION DES ABSENCES

### Reference Number
PW-22-01009437

### Solicitation Number
001593

### Publication Date
2022-10-06

### Tender Closing Date
2022-11-14T14:00:00 (Expiring)

### Description
The Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites qualified suppliers to submit their proposals for the provision of absence management services, including:

* Salary Continuance Program management
* Stay at work services and supports, including access to treatment prior to a leave
* Intermittent absence management
* Accommodation and ergonomic support

The expected term of the contract is five years, with options to extend for an additional two years.

### Eligibility Criteria
 Suppliers are required to have expertise in provision of absence management services, including salary continuance program management and stay at work services and supports.

### Evaluation Criteria
The project evaluation will be based on the following criteria:

* Technical Competence
* Past Performance
* Pricing and Value for Money

### Solicitation Method
Competitive - Open bidding

### Trade Agreements
CETA (Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement)

### Regions of Opportunity
Canada

### Regions of Delivery
Canada
